text:
When this line 
"log4j.category.org.apache = INFO "
was used with whitespace inadvertantly included at the end the whitespace was 
considered significant by log4j and the log level was not set to INFO as 
required, nor to the root value of INFO but to DEBUG.
creator: danny@apache.org
mprice@atl.lmco.com
text:
Created attachment 12268
Patch to resolve this issue (if there actually is one - see comments)

creator: mprice@atl.lmco.com
text:
If people actually view spaces in a level as a bug then the attached patch fixes
this issue. If people do not view spaces in a level as a bug then this issue
should be closed as a WONTFIX. Either way this one can be closed.

creator: yoavs@computer.org
text:
I think it's a good catch and a good fix, so I've committed it.  Thanks for 
pointing it out.
